title: Reward for involvement in governance
body:
We should reward the involvement of the community in governance
we could give them a reward for voting and being active in the governance
if they vote and the proposal passed they also get a bonus for deciding the direction
if you vote you get a reward
if you vote and the proposal passed all who voted yes get a bonus as well
we could choose from these options

50 YFARM for voting

100 YFARM for voting

150 YFARM for voting

200 YFARM for voting

they higher the reward we choose them more likely the community will be incentivized to vote

if it passes and you voted for it to pass you also get a bonus 50 YFARM
author: 0xeeFDA9DfaB30370f68B945aca37A8ff7300dd554
